snippet.title: Need for Speed Most Wanted | Wii U Trailer
snippet.description:
Need for Speed Most Wanted U, the definitive Most Wanted experience, utilizes the unique features of the Wii U™ GamePad to introduce "Co-Driver" where your friend plays using the Wii Remote. You can activate boost, adjust cop difficulty and change mods using the Wii U™ GamePad, as they race their way to the top of the Most Wanted list!  2012's driving game of the year comes complete with full online play, the connected, open world city of Fairhaven and of course the hot cars and intense cop chases that made Most Wanted. We've also thrown in the Ultimate Speed Pack, so you can take to the streets in five of the sickest, most ludicrously fast cars ever made.

Find out more: http://uk.needforspeed.com
